title: Erikson 8th and final stage of lifespan

content.question: According to the psychosocial theory of development, in late adulthood the individual reaches the eighth and final stage of the life span in which one reviews and evaluates oneâ€™s life and the choices one has made. The theory labeled this stage as which of the following?

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
